get.description: Users are redirected to web app to authenticate themselves and authorize the app with `client_id` to act on behalf of themselves.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: Identifier of the Zeplin app requesting user authentication

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: User is redirected to this endpoint after authorization

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: RECOMMENDED. An opaque value used by the client to maintain state between the request and callback.

parameters.name: code_challenge
parameters.description: RECOMMENDED. A PKCE code challenge derived from the code verifier, to be verified against later.

parameters.name: code_challenge_method
parameters.description: RECOMMENDED. PKCE code verifier transformation method.

302.description: User is redirected to web app for authorization

post.description: If `grant_type` is given as `authorization_code`; handles code flow. If `grant_type` is given as `refresh_token` handles refresh token flow.

value.detail: Provided `code` is not usable for the provided `client_id`
Provided `refresh_token` is not usable for the provided `client_id`
Provided `redirect_uri` must be whitelisted for the application
Refresh token cannot be used with increased scope

Note: Users that have authorized the app before webhooks release must re-authorize the app to create webhooks.

get.description: Fetch all design tokens of the project

Lists all styleguides user is a member of unless `linked_project` or `linked_styleguide` parameter is given.

If `linked_project` parameter is provided, lists styleguide linked to the given project and its ancestors. Returns error if the project referenced with `linked_project` is not accessible.

Simiarly, lists styleguide linked to the given styleguide and its ancestors if `linked_styleguide` parameter is provided. Returns error if the styleguide referenced with `linked_styleguide` is not accessible.

☝️ `linked_project` and `linked_styleguide` should not be used in conjunction.

 Also, styleguides can be filtered by workspace using the `workspace` parameter. `workspace` parameter is ignored when `linked_project` or `linked_styleguide` parameter is provided.

Returns a single styleguide that user has access.

User is considered eligible to access a styleguide if any of the following conditions is met:
* User is a member of the styleguide
* User is a member of the organization that the styleguide belongs to
* User is a member of a project which is linked to the styleguide (using `linked_project` parameter)
* User is a member of a project and the styleguide is an ancestor of the project's linked styleguide (using `linked_project` parameter)
* User is a member of a styleguide that the styleguide is one of its ancestors (using `linked_styleguide` parameter)

patch.description: Update a styleguide's name and description

get.description: List all notifications of the user

patch.description:
Updates all user notifications unless `type` or `id` parameter is given.

If `type` parameter is provided, updates notifications with matching type.

Similarly, updates notifications with matching identifiers if `id` parameter is provided.

☝️ `type` and `id` should not be used in conjunction.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
Filter by id

**Note:** Please prefer multiple parameter instances over comma-separated values.

Example: `?id=5fbe387f8c72ef23659fb500&id=602281f4783f72fccc045484`

get.description: Get a notification by id

patch.description: Update a notification for the user

access_token.description: Access token that allows you to make requests to the API on behalf of a user

refresh_token.description: Refresh token that allows you to obtain access tokens

absolute.description: Absolute position of the bounding rectangle

id.description: Identifier of the color

created.description: The unix timestamp when the color was created

Color's identifier in the design tool

User.title: User
User.description:
Basic info about Zeplin users.

Zeplin API does not expose any personal information to third-party clients. For this reason, the `email` field is a Zeplin-only alias by default.

You can get the original email addresses of members of your workspace by using a personal access token created with admin rights. Third-party (OAuth) applications are not allowed to access this information.

☝️*Only organization admins (or higher) can retrieve the original email addresses using an admin token.*

id.description: User's unique id

email.description: Zeplin-only alias for the user's email (original)

last_seen.description: The unix timestamp when the user was last seen

RemPreferences.title: rem Preferences
RemPreferences.description: rem preferences of project or styleguide. The content of this property varies depending on the value of its status field.

root_font_size.description: Font size of the root element

use_for_font_sizes.description: Whether rem unit is used for font sizes

use_for_measurements.description: Whether rem unit is used for measurements

DisabledOrLinkedRemPreferences.title: Disabled or Linked rem Preferences
DisabledOrLinkedRemPreferences.description: If `status` is `"linked"`, project or styleguide uses its parent styleguide as the source of preferences.

Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description:
Assets are automatically generated while exporting designs based on the platform the design is exported. Asset formats and densities change according to these platforms.

Platform | Formats
---|---|---
Base | PNG (1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0), and PDF
Web | PNG (1.0, 2.0, 3.0), SVG, and JPG (bitmap image)
iOS | PNG (1.0, 2.0, 3.0), and PDF
Android | PNG (1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0), and SVG

layer_source_id.description: Layer's identifier in the design tool

layer_name.description: Name of the layer containing the asset

Thumbnails.title: Thumbnails
Thumbnails.description: Thumbnail image URLs in various sizes. The aspect ratio of the original image is preserved. If the width of original image is lower than the desired width then the original width is used.

small.description: URL of the thumbnail image with a width of at most 256 pixels

medium.description: URL of the thumbnail image with a width of at most 512 pixels

large.description: URL of the thumbnail image with a width of at most 1024 pixels

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description:
Notification objects have a polymorphic structure. They can be of various types and each type has a certain set of actions that describe the notification further. Notification content (specifically `resource` and `context` fields) varies based on the value of type field. These variations and their details are described in the table below. Type | Actions | Context | Resource | Description --| --| --| --| -- `workspace.project` | `activated`
`archived`
`deleted`
`ownership_transferred` | - | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | Used for changes related to projects in a workspace. `workspace.styleguide` | `activated`
`archived`
`deleted`
`ownership_transferred` | - | `Styleguide (extra: { name, platform })` | Used for changes related to styleguides in a workspace. `workspace.organization.member` | `role_updated`
`invited` | `Organization (extra: { name })` | `OrganizationMember (extra: { role })` | Used for changes related to members of a workspace. `project.screen` | `created`
`version_created`
`deleted` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })`
`ScreenVersion (extra: { image_url, thumbnails, width, height })` | `Screen (extra: { name })` | Used for changes related to screens in a project. `project.screen.note` | `created`
`mentioned` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })`
`Screen (extra: { name })`
`ScreenNoteComment (extra: { content })` | `Screen (extra: { order, color, status })` | Used for changes related to notes. `project.screen.note.comment` | `created`
`mentioned` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })`
`Screen (extra: { name })`
`Screen (extra: { order, color, status })` | `ScreenNoteComment (extra: { content })` | Used for changes related to note comments. `project.color` | `created`
`updated`
`deleted` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | `Color (extra: { name, r, g, b, a })` | Used for changes related to colors in a project. `project.text_style` | `created`
`updated`
`deleted` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | `TextStyle (extra: { name })` | Used for changes related to text styles in a project. `project.component` | `created`
`version_created`
`deleted` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | `Component (extra: { name })` | Used for changes related to components in a project. `project.spacing_token` | `created`
`updated`
`deleted` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | `SpacingToken (extra: { name, value })` | Used for changes related to spacing tokens in a project. `project.member` | `joined` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | | Used for changes related to members of a project. `project.extension` | `added`
`removed` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | `Extension (extra: { name })` | Used for changes related to extensions in a project. `project.slack_integration` | `added` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | `SlackIntegration (extra: { channel })` | Used for changes related to slack intgrations in a project. `project.jira_attachment` | `added`
`removed` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })` | `JiraIntegration (extra: { issue })` | Used for changes related to jira attachments in a project. `project.screen.jira_attachment` | `added`
`removed` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })`
`Screen (extra: { name })` | `JiraIntegration (extra: { issue })` | Used for changes related to jira attachments in a screen. `project.screen_section.jira_attachment` | `added`
`removed` | `Project (extra: { name, platform })`
`ScreenSection (extra: { name })` | `JiraIntegration (extra: { issue })` | Used for changes related to jira attachments in a screen section. `styleguide.color` | `created`
`updated`
`deleted` | `Styleguide (extra: { name, platform })` | `Color (extra: { name, r, g, b, a })` | Used for changes related to colors in a styleguide. `styleguide.text_style` | `created`
`updated`
`deleted` | `Styleguide (extra: { name, platform })` | `TextStyle (extra: { name })` | Used for changes related to text styles in a styleguide. `styleguide.component` | `created`
`version_created`
`deleted` | `Styleguide (extra: { name, platform })` | `Component (extra: { name })` | Used for changes related to components in a styleguide. `styleguide.spacing_token` | `created`
`updated`
`deleted` | `Styleguide (extra: { name, platform })` | `SpacingToken (extra: { name, value })` | Used for changes related to spacing tokens in a styleguide. `styleguide.member` | `joined` | `Styleguide (extra: { name, platform })` | `User (extra: { username })` | Used for changes related to members of a styleguide. `styleguide.extension` | `added`
`removed` | `Styleguide (extra: { name, platform })` | `Extension (extra: { name })` | Used for changes related to extensions in a styleguide. `styleguide.slack_integration` | `added` | `Styleguide (extra: { name, platform })` | `SlackIntegration (extra: { channel })` | Used for changes related to slack intgrations in a styleguide. `user.project_membership` | `invited`
`role_updated`

`role_updated`

id.description: The unique id of the notification

is_read.description: Whether the notification is read or not

created.description: The unix timestamp when the screen was created

updated.description: The unix timestamp when the screen was updated

context.description: Additional objects which are related to the main resource object. The content of this object changes depending on the `type` field (e.g. `{ project: { ... }, screen: { ... } }` for a screen related notification).

NotificationActor.title: Notification Actor
NotificationActor.description: The actor of the change triggering this notification

NotificationResource.title: Notification Resource
NotificationResource.description: The main object that this notification is related. It contains the ID of the object along with its type and partial data. The content of this object varies between notification types.

id.description: The unique id of the resource (e.g. `"5ed05ecf3356a7967b21f12b"`)

type.description: Type of the object, which is one of the API models (e.g. `"ScreenVersion"`)

extra.description: Partial data of the resource, whose content changes depending on the `type` field

id.description: The unique id of the workflow status

name.description: The name of the workflow status

rect.description: Bounding rectangle of the link's hotspot

value.description: The value of color token in `rgb(r, g, b)` or `rgba(r, g, b, a)` format.

ColorDesignTokenMetadata.title: Color Design Token Metadata

source.description: Source of the design token–either `project` or `styleguide`.

resource.description: Details of the `Color` object that the design token is generated from.

ColorDesignTokenMetadata.description: Additional information about the color token

SpacingDesignTokenMetadata.title: Spacing Design Token Metadata
SpacingDesignTokenMetadata.description: Additional information about the spacing token

source.description: Source of the design token–either `project` or `styleguide`.

resource.description: Details of the `SpacingToken` object that the design token is generated from.

spacing_section.description: The reference of the spacing section the spacing token belongs to.

TextStyleDesignTokenMetadata.title: Text Style Design Token Metadata
TextStyleDesignTokenMetadata.description: Additional information about the text style token

source.description: Source of the design token–either `project` or `styleguide`.

resource.description: Details of the `TextStyle` object that the design token is generated from.

line_height.description: Minimum height of a line for the text style

alignment.description: Horizontal alignment of the text style, `left`, `right`, `center`, or `justify`

color.description:
The value of color in `rgb(r, g, b)` or `rgba(r, g, b, a)` format for the text style.

☝️*If there's a matching color token for the text style's color, the color token's value is returned as a reference, e.g. `{$colors.light-yellow.value}`.*

stretch.description: Font stretch form of the text style, e.g. `0.75`, `1.00`

DesignTokenSource.description: Source details for design token. It has to be either `project` or `styleguide`.

source_id.description: Color's identifier in the design tool

code.description: Applies when `grant_type` is `authorization_code`. The `code` obtained after `authorization` request

redirect_uri.description: The URL where users will be redirected after authorization

client_secret.description:
The `client_secret` of your Zeplin app

**Note**: `client_secret` is required for `code` values obtained without using a PKCE `code_challenge` value.

**Warning**: `client_secret` property should only be used in a server-side application. 
If your Zeplin app is a public client, you should use PKCE authorization flow.

code_verifier.description: A cryptographically random string that is used to correlate the authorization request to the token request

refresh_token.description: Applies when `grant_type` is `refresh_token`. The `refresh_token` you obtained while generating the access token in the first place

client_secret.description:
The `client_secret` of your Zeplin app

**Note**: `client_secret` is required for `code` values obtained without using a PKCE `code_challenge` value.

**Warning**: `client_secret` property should only be used in a server-side application. 
If your Zeplin app is a public client, you should use PKCE authorization flow.

code_verifier.description: A cryptographically random string that is used to correlate the authorization request to the token request

WorkspaceNotificationEvent.title: Workspace Notification Event
WorkspaceNotificationEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to user's notifications.

WorkspaceProjectEvent.title: Workspace Project Event
WorkspaceProjectEvent.description:
This event is used to notify webhooks about changes directly related to Zeplin projects:
 - Project is created or deleted
 - Project's linked styleguide changes
 - Any of these properties change:
   - name
   - description
   - density scale (1x, 2x, etc.)
   - thumbnail image
   - status (archived or activated)
   - rem preferences (web projects only)"

WorkspaceStyleguideEvent.title: Workspace Styleguide Event
WorkspaceStyleguideEvent.description:
This event is used to notify webhooks about changes directly related to Zeplin styleguides:
 - Styleguide is created or deleted
 - Styleguide's parent styleguide changes
 - Any of these properties change:
   - name
   - description
   - density scale (1x, 2x, etc.)
   - thumbnail image
   - status (archived or activated)
   - rem preferences (web styleguides only)"

WorkspaceOrganizationEvent.title: Workspace Organization Event
WorkspaceOrganizationEvent.description:
This event is used to notify webhooks about any of these activies:
   - Name or logo of the organization was changed
   - User requested to join the organization

WorkspaceOrganizationMemberEvent.title: Workspace Organization Member Event
WorkspaceOrganizationMemberEvent.description:
This event is used to notify webhooks about any of these activies related to the organization's members:
   - New member added
   - Member removed
   - Member's role changed
   - Member's tag changed

WorkspaceOrganizationMemberRoleUpdatedEv.title: Workspace Organization Member Role Updated Event

WorkspaceOrganizationMemberTagUpdatedEve.title: Workspace Organization Member Tag Updated Event

ProjectMemberEvent.title: Project Member Event
ProjectMemberEvent.description:
This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to the project's members:
   - New member invited
   - Member removed
   - Member's role changed

ProjectScreenEvent.title: Project Screen Event
ProjectScreenEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a screen in Zeplin projects.

version.description: The details of the screen's version (exists for all actions except `deleted` action).

ProjectScreenVersionEvent.title: Project Screen Version Event
ProjectScreenVersionEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a screen versions in Zeplin projects.

project.description: Project that contains the screen version

screen.description: Screen that the version belongs to

ProjectNoteEvent.title: Project Note Event
ProjectNoteEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a notes in Zeplin projects.

project.description: Project that contains the screen in which the note has been added

screen.description: Screen in which the note has been added

ProjectNoteCommentEvent.title: Project Note Comment Event
ProjectNoteCommentEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to the comments in notes in Zeplin projects.

project.description: Project in which the comment has been added

screen.description: Screen in which the comment has been added

note.description: Note in which the comment has been added

ProjectColorEvent.title: Project Color Event
ProjectColorEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a colors in the local styleguide of Zeplin projects.

ProjectTextStyleEvent.title: Project Text Style Event
ProjectTextStyleEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a text styles in the local styleguide of Zeplin projects.

project.description: Project that contains the text style

ProjectComponentEvent.title: Project Component Event
ProjectComponentEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a components in the local styleguide of Zeplin projects.

version.description: The details of the component's version (exists for all actions except `deleted` action).

ProjectSpacingTokenEvent.title: Project Spacing Token Event
ProjectSpacingTokenEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a spacing tokens in the local styleguide of Zeplin projects.

project.description: Project that contains the spacing token

StyleguideMemberEvent.title: Styleguide Member Event
StyleguideMemberEvent.description:
This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to the styleguide's members:
   - New member invited
   - Member removed
   - Member's role changed

StyleguideColorEvent.title: Styleguide Color Event
StyleguideColorEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a colors in Zeplin styleguides.

StyleguideTextStyleEvent.title: Styleguide Text Style Event
StyleguideTextStyleEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a text styles in Zeplin styleguides.

styleguide.description: Styleguide that contains the text style

StyleguideComponentEvent.title: Styleguide Component Event
StyleguideComponentEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a components in Zeplin styleguides.

version.description: The details of the component's version (exists for all actions except `deleted` action).

StyleguideSpacingTokenEvent.title: Styleguide Spacing Token Event
StyleguideSpacingTokenEvent.description: This event is used to notify webhooks about changes related to a spacing tokens in Zeplin styleguides.

styleguide.description: Styleguide that contains the spacing token
